thread.title: Arsenal players convinced Arsene Wenger will STAY... and reckon sign new two-year contract extension
thread.title_full: Arsenal players convinced Arsene Wenger will STAY... and reckon sign new two-year contract extension

title: Arsenal players convinced Arsene Wenger will STAY... and reckon sign new two-year contract extension
text:
Chief executive Ivan Gazidis has already drawn up a shortlist of potential replacements just in case. 
But, according to The Times , Wenger has given no indication to players or staff that he is preparing to walk. 
It is claimed the boss is even already making plans for the next campaign, including formulating training schedules and making hotel bookings for Arsenal’s pre-season tour to Australia. 
Wenger’s final decision will depend on Arsenal’s form for the remainder of the campaign – as well as the mood of the club’s increasing split supporters. I will be a manager somewhere next season says Arsenal manager Wenger Related Stories Get Beller-in Pep Guardiola ready to go to war with Barcelona in the summer to sign Arsenal full-back Hector Bellerin Mbappe battle Juventus to rival Arsenal and Man City for Kylian Mbappe after dazzling Champions League display wenger gesture Arsene Wenger sends moving letter to family of missing Arsenal fan Jack Glenn as search continues GRIEZ COMING Antoine Griezmann will DEFINITELY join Manchester United, says ex-Arsenal star Emmanuel Petit Eu've got no chance Arsene Wenger will snub mega-money offers from China and stay in Europe if he leaves Arsenal IAN WRIGHT Man Utd fans should show Wayne Rooney some love... he's done unbelievable things there kyl any hope Arsenal transfer blow as Monaco star Kylian Mbappe had posters of Real Madrid on his bedroom wall HEC OF A WORRY Hector Bellerin believed to be open to Barcelona move... if Arsene Wenger leaves Arsenal 

The Gunners have finished in the top four in every one of Wenger’s 20 seasons in charge of the club and remain on course to do so again this term. 
And, with a favourable quarter-final draw against non-league Lincoln, Arsenal are among the favourites to win a third FA Cup in four seasons. 
Wenger’s fate is likely to influence the futures of a number of star names at the club in the summer transfer window. 
While the futures of superstar pair Alexis Sanchez and Mesut Ozil remain up in the air. Sutton United 0-2 Arsenal : Sutton’s magical FA Cup run is ended in gritty encounter
